categories: Category:Military officers of the Sith Empire

nodes.text: Sergeant Corin was a male Human officer of the reconstituted Sith Empire living during the Cold War. Around 3642 BBY he was stationed in the Dorn Base on Hoth, handling equipment management.

Sergeant Corin appeared in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic, released by BioWare in 2011, as an Equipment Commendations Vendor for Imperial players on Hoth. With the release of Game Update 4.0 on October 20, 2015, he was removed from the game along with the rest of the Equipment Commendations Vendors.
